title: Thunder Gun 4: Maximum Cool
description: Colonel Washington has stolen a formula from Dr. Ling’s lab. In the wrong hands, it could be used as a powerful weapon and destroy millions of lives. She recruits John Thundergun, who doesn’t realize they’ve met before.
starring: Dolph Lundgren, Emily Chang, Carlin James, Kirk Bovill
altHero: Thundergun is anguished watching activists on a holograph
alt1: Dr. Ling’s assistant Max shows Thundergun a hologram of Colonel Washington
alt2: Dr. Ling and Thundergun are tied to a pole in a warehouse
alt3: closeup of Dr. Ling and Thundergun
alt4: Thundergun passes a torch to Max
